events.title: TechFront AI and Blockchain
events.shortDescription: Flagship AI & Blockchain Conference featuring visionary talks, hands-on workshops, and India’s brightest tech minds.
events.fullDescription:
Step into the epicenter of innovation where trailblazers in Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain converge for a day of inspiration, learning, and connection. Whether you’re a student, developer, entrepreneur, or tech leader, this flagship conference offers a unique opportunity to explore breakthrough ideas, experience live demos, and engage with the brightest minds in the industry.

**Highlights:**
- Visionary Talks from industry leaders
- Hands-on AI & Blockchain Workshops
- Thought-provoking Panel Discussions
- Showcase Arena for project demos
- Networking Lounges with top talent
- Exclusive Swag & Prizes for attendees

**Why Attend?**
See how AI and blockchain are transforming industries. Get strategies from experts, and meet your future collaborators, mentors, or employers.

**Speakers Panel:**
“This year’s speaker lineup is our strongest yet, featuring pioneers in AI, blockchain, and decentralized systems. Expect deep dives, bold predictions, and practical tips you won’t hear anywhere else!”

**Register now and join the movement shaping the future of technology!**

speakers.name: Arghya Kamal Guha
speakers.title: Management Consultant | AI & Automation Strategist | LinkedIn Market Insider Certified
speakers.bio: Arghya is a management consultant at Protiviti Global Consulting, specializing in digital transformation through AI, automation, and ERP modernization. With a background in Computer Science Engineering (B.Tech) and Business Administration (MBA), he bridges technical depth with strategic insight. LinkedIn Market Insider certified, he’s passionate about creative problem-solving, enterprise automation, and integrating AI in business operations and MarComm workflows.

speakers.name: Aashi Gupta
speakers.title: Senior AI Engineer
speakers.bio: Aashi Gupta is a Senior AI Engineer at Marsh McLennan, specializing in enterprise-scale AI/NLP solutions using GenAI, LangChain, LangGraph, and agent-based frameworks. She’s built systems for ticket auto-routing, KB recommendation, and text-to-SQL with MLOps. An MS in Data Science, she is recognized for building responsible, explainable AI and driving business impact through innovation.

speakers.name: Arun Kumar Yadav
speakers.title: Blockchain Developer
speakers.bio: Arun is a seasoned blockchain developer with expertise in crafting smart contracts across ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155 standards, and DePIN solutions. He’s delivered real-world projects on lotteries, crowdfunding, tokenization, and RWA. Proficient in Solidity and the Ethereum ecosystem, Arun is passionate about scaling decentralized infrastructure and collaborating on the next wave of blockchain innovation.

speakers.name: Mukul Goyal
speakers.title: Tech Entrepreneur | AI & Blockchain Strategist | Founder – DIMRAJ
speakers.bio: Mukul is the founder of DIMRAJ, working at the intersection of AI, blockchain, and digital platforms. With a background in software engineering, ML, and startups, he mentors innovators and builds open-source tools. Active in Google Cloud and GenAI communities, Mukul focuses on tech sovereignty, future-ready platforms, and blending decentralization with intelligence.
